USELAYER_DESCRIPTION: This command will apply a selected Layer to a card of your choice. You can buy Layers by using the "{{prefix}}layershop" command
CARD_INVALID: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
CANNOT_APPLY_LAYER_GIF: {{author}} You cannot apply a **Layer** to a **GIF** card
USE_LAYER_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to apply the **{{name}}** **Layer** to this card?
UL_EMBED_FOOTER: Confirming this process will destroy the currently applied Layer
CARD_NOT_IN_COLLECTION: {{author}} The card is no longer in your collection
USE_LAYER_SUCCESSFUL: {{author}} Successfully applied the **{{name}}** **Layer** to your card
